review: Dr.Rudra has been treating my tooth problems for a couple of years. Whenever I have any dental issues, and my only solution is Dr. Rudra.  Nowadays, I stay in Hyderabad, but for all my dental issues, I still really consult only Dr. Rudra. Yesterday, I went to see Dr. Rudra. A cavity caused me to have to extract a tooth, which caused me to feel really upset. Despite my fear of needles, injections, and other procedures, Dr. Rudra made it easier. His experienced hand and patience made it extremely easy and smooth, and I am now completely fine. I am satisfied and happy with the treatment.

review:
This is my first time, first hand experience with Dr. Argho Rudra sir. He called me and informed me that he will be late for my appointment with him. So the wait time was very minimal. I had a major tooth ache which was arising due to severe tooth decay. But his dexterity in performing tooth extraction helped me feel no pain during the said procedure. He even attended me at midnight when I was in a state of severe pain the day before the said procedure. 

p.s. I had a wedding ceremony next day where I ate like a shark and felt no pain. Though, neither me nor Dr. Rudra sir  will recommend doing that. üòÑ

review: What I appreciated the most in Doctor Rudra was his ease of handling and openness to patient's understanding of the problem at hand. I personally struggle with being able to brush my teeth in the right manner but had been looking up ways of improving before my last appointment. The fact that doctor Rudra gave me the liberty to combine my discretion with his instructions, speaks very well about his friendliness and judgement of the issue at hand.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Today I went to visit Dr. Argha Rudra and he did anaesthesia for some dental operation. However, after coming back home I am having some issues. My throat is burning and itching since then. Also, while I am lying down their is cough and cold and irritation in my mouth and throat. I am unable to take any food because of this issues. 

I have taken medicines as per his dvise after lunch.
Request you to advise on the above issues.

Regards,
Chhanda Mukherjee

But I was reached before 9.30 pm to the dispensary , but till 10.45 pm I was waiting for treatment.  Time is very precious for every person. Hope in future time slot should maintain properly.
